item.title: Install CodeGenie
item.description: CodeGenie is available in the VSCode Extension Marketplace, or in VSCode’s extension panel itself. Once installed, just paste in your OpenAI API key and you’re good to go.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Syntax highlighting and menus can be configured via config.toml.

item.title: Editor Integration
item.description: CodeGenie integrates with VSCode in both the Command Palette and the Context Menu.
